subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Television
lead_paragraph: Mel Kiper is the face — and the hair — of a sprawling N.F.L. draft empire that is as much a product of his hard work as it is his wife's, Kim Kiper.
snippet: Mel Kiper is the face — and the hair — of a sprawling N.F.L. draft empire that is as much a product of his hard work as it is his wife's, Kim Kiper.
